title: Zachary Levi
summary: Zachary Levi Pugh (/ˈzækəri ˈliːvaɪ/; born September 29, 1980)[2] is an American actor, comedian, and singer. He received critical acclaim for starring as Chuck Bartowski in the series Chuck, and as the title character[3][4] in Shazam!, as a part of the DC Extended Universe.
